mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY(MEMBER_ID, POST_TITLE, POST_TEXT, RESTAURANT_NAME, RESTAURANT_TEL, STREET_ADDRESS, AREA_ADDRESS, MENU_TYPE, MAIN_MENU_TITLE, MAIN_MENU_PRICE) VALUES ( #{member.memberId}, #{postTitle}, #{postText}, #{restaurantName}, #{restaurantTel}, #{streetAddress}, #{areaAddress}, #{menuType}, #{mainMenuTitle}, #{mainMenuPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, POST_TITLE, POST_TEXT, RESTAURANT_NAME, RESTAURANT_TEL, STREET_ADDRESS, AREA_ADDRESS, MENU_TYPE, MAIN_MENU_TITLE, MAIN_MENU_PRICE FROM COMMUNITY WHERE POST_NO = #{value}
